attributes.action: Stop government plans to hold all telephone calls and emails on a central database
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of the United Kingdom petition the Prime Minister to scrap plans to hold all UK telephone conversations and emails on a central database. This plan ubder the guise of "prevention of terrorism" will shred the last vestiges of personal privacy from the British people and add one more turn of the "Big Brother" key.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
